item.title: Velocity Rift
item.description: Game Description Velocity Rift puts a player for driving a vehicle with a view of the top, setting him the task of competing on tracks located on a secluded island. A single gameplay is built around 3 separate game modes, each of which has its own rules and conditions for victory. Promotion on these diverse competitions requires a constant concentration from the racer to pass complicated routes and maneuvers of computer opponents.

item.title: Le Mans Ultimate
item.description: Game Description Le Mans Ultimate - The official game FIA ​​World Enduraance Championship and “24 hours of Le Man”, promises exciting experience to both experienced riders and beginners. Runned in early access, the game offers to try the exciting season of 2023 with official cars, legendary tracks and online media. Sit behind the wheel of ultramodern hypercars from manufacturers such as Toyota, Ferrari and Porsche, and recreate the battles on prestigious tracks.

item.title: Alaskan Road Truckers
item.description: Game Description ALASKAN ROAD TRUCKERS - A car simulator in which you will become a driver of huge trucks, being a trucker in snowy Alaska. Call a challenge of one of the most severe and dangerous environments that could only be in such simulators. Test your strength and try to survive in a harsh environment. At the same time, you will have the opportunity to see the stunning beauty of this northern region.

item.title: Virtual Sailor NG
item.description: Game Description Virtual Sailor NG is a simulator with the open world, concentrated on the management of water vessels. The physical system of the project reproduces marine dynamics and behavior of various boats on the water. This allows gamers to direct vessels anywhere within the environment, which opens up scope for research. Players master all forms of sailing, using the first -person species and 6 degrees of freedom. Both single and multiplayer regime are available.

item.title: Drive Beyond Horizons
item.description: Game Description Drive Beond Horizons Refuses the line path and throws gamers into a huge, constantly changing world. Fasten the belts and get ready for the study - the procedurally generated landscapes make each game unique. Leave the comfort zone and choose your own route. Travel through spacious deserts, lush forests, on any roads (or their absence). But this is not just an excursion trip. Drive Beond Horizons is fraught with many secrets and difficulties that have to be solved.
